title: Machine Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Reggio Emilia Approach in Early Childhood Remote Education

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: A digital education module can be designed to encourage young children’s physical activities in home environments using the Reggio Emilia approach.
A system for planning and evaluating daily play activities through parent-child collaboration can be developed.
A diagnostic report on young children’s physical development can be created using digital observation tools (photo/video recordings).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
